name: Chronicles of the Ascended
description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CaNatGames

This is a little project that I have been working on for awhile. It's just your standard bread and butter OmoRPG. This is a "complete" version of the first part but there might still be a bug or two here or there. 

The title screen, character battle sprites, and music are all placeholders while I continue working on this. There most likely won't be any updates before the full game is released, so check out my Twitter every now and then to see what's being added!
